channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: You will be auto-enrolled in Medicare Advantage and locked in for three years under this new bill in Congress
item.description: Medicare Advantage could become the default insurance program for all older adults

item.title: Here’s what Americans are willing to sacrifice to save Social Security
item.description: Americans agree — across political, economic and generational lines — that the program is worth saving.

item.title: Figma’s IPO seeks a $13 billion valuation, with a bitcoin investment as a sweetener
item.description: Figma sets terms in its upcoming initial public offering, and co-founder Dylan Field could net more than $60 million from selling his personal shares.

item.title: Verizon’s stock is having its best day in over a year. Here’s the big highlight from earnings.
item.description: The telecom giant upped its expectations for free cash flow, a closely followed investor metric.

item.title: ‘Poof! His money could disappear’: My boyfriend is 75. His portfolio is down 4% this year. Do we fire his adviser?
item.description: “His portfolio is still down from the April slump when everybody else’s accounts have gone up.”

item.title: The Download: how your data is being used to train AI, and why chatbots aren’t doctors
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. A major AI t...

item.title: The search is on: Help us find the most promising robotics startups
item.description: The Robotics Startup Radar will highlight unique robotics startups we believe our readers should keep an eye on in the years to come. The post The sea...

item.title: AI companies have stopped warning you that their chatbots aren’t doctors
item.description: AI companies have now mostly abandoned the once-standard practice of including medical disclaimers and warnings in response to health questions, new r...

item.title: Rethinking global connectivity: Why stratospheric UAVs could outperform satellites
item.description: Swift Engineering's president explores how solar-powered UAVs offer low-latency communications that could overcome satellite congestion. The post Reth...

item.title: Weaving reality or warping it? The personalization trap in AI systems
item.description: Each of our versions of reality is changing with AI. This could erode our ability to agree on basic facts or navigate shared challenges.

item.title: 5 key questions your developers should be asking about MCP
item.description: It’s MCP projects in production, not specification elegance or market buzz, that will determine if MCP (or something else) stays on top.

item.title: New embedding model leaderboard shakeup: Google takes #1 while Alibaba’s open source alternative closes gap
item.description: Google's new Gemini Embedding model now leads the MTEB benchmark. But it is facing fierce competition from closed and open source rivals.

item.title: Maxvision buys core robot assets of Aldebaran, including Nao and Pepper
item.description: Maxvision said Aldebaran's IP and humanoid robots will enable it to make significant strides in its strategic roadmap. The post Maxvision buys core ro...

item.title: America can’t out-innovate China without mechanical engineers — or robots
item.description: Shaun Edwards, co-founder and CTO of Plus One Robotics, explains why the U.S. needs a national strategy that invests in STEM education. The post Ameri...

item.title: Meet AnyCoder, a new Kimi K2-powered tool for fast prototyping and deploying web apps
item.description: For novice developers or even those with expertise who want to spin up a new project fast, AnyCoder seems like a great place to start.

item.title: How OpenAI’s red team made ChatGPT agent into an AI fortress
item.description: Discover OpenAI's red team blueprint: How 110 coordinated attacks and 7 exploit fixes created ChatGPT Agent's revolutionary 95% security defense syste...

item.description: Jan Zizka describes Brightpick's innovative Giraffe Autopicker, and Charlie Kemp explains Hello Robot's mobile manipulator. The post Reaching new heig...
